mapper.select: select b.att_no, b.att_name, b.att_content, b.att_startdate, b.att_enddate, b.att_place, b.att_sales, b.att_price, b.att_discountprice, b.att_category, b.att_thumbnail, b.att_photo, b.att_lat, b.att_lng, (select nvl(round(avg(x.review_star),1), 0) from att_review x where x.att_no = b.att_no) star, (select count(x.review_no) cnt from att_review x where x.att_no = b.att_no) cnt from attraction b where (att_enddate is null or att_enddate > sysdate) order by att_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into attraction(att_no, att_name, att_content, att_startdate, att_enddate, att_place, att_category, att_thumbnail, att_photo, att_address, att_detailcontent, att_lat, att_lng, att_price) values (att_no_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{place}, #{category}, #{thumbnail}, #{photo}, #{address}, #{detail}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{price})
insert into att_option(att_no, att_option, att_price, att_optNo) values (att_no_seq.currval, #{option}, #{price}, att_optno_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select count(*) from attraction where (att_enddate is null or att_enddate > sysdate)

select * from ( select a.*, (select nvl(round(avg(x.review_star),1), 0) from att_review x where x.att_no = a.att_no) star, (select count(x.review_no) cnt from att_review x where x.att_no = a.att_no) cnt from attraction a where att_place like '%' || #{place} || '%' and (att_enddate is null or att_enddate > sysdate)
and (replace(att_name, ' ', '') like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or replace(att_content, ' ', '') like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
and att_category like '%' || #{category} || '%'
and (att_startdate is null or to_char(#{startdate},'YYYY-MM-DD') > att_startdate)
and (att_startdate is null or to_char(#{enddate},'YYYY-MM-DD') < att_enddate)
) order by att_no desc

select count(*) from ( select a.* from attraction a where att_place like '%' || #{place} || '%' and (att_enddate is null or att_enddate > sysdate)
and (replace(att_name, ' ', '') like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or replace(att_content, ' ', '') like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
and att_category like '%' || #{category} || '%'
and (att_startdate is null or to_char(#{startdate},'YYYY-MM-DD') > att_startdate)
and (att_startdate is null or to_char(#{enddate},'YYYY-MM-DD') < att_enddate)
) order by att_no desc

select DISTINCT c.coupon_name as couponName, c.coupon_category as category, c.coupon_discountrate as discountRate, c.coupon_enddate as endDate, c.coupon_no as couponNo from coupons c, coupons_user u where c.coupon_no not in (select coupon_no from coupons_user where user_no = #{userNo}) and coupon_category like '%즐길거리%' and coupon_enddate > sysdate and coupon_deleted='n' and coupon_used='n' and coupon_quantity > 0
select att_no, att_name, att_thumbnail, att_place from( select * from attraction order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) where rownum<5 and (att_enddate is null or att_enddate > sysdate)
